word: This is a terrible deception. Do not give ear to the tempter, but say: \93Jesus has died that I might live. He loves me, and wills not that I should perish. I have a compassionate heavenly Father; and although I have abused His love, though the blessings He has graciously given me have been squandered, I will arise, and go to my Father, and say: \91I have sinned . . . , and am no more worthy to be called thy son: make me as one of thy hired servants.\92\94
